website_summaries.verdict: This product is perfect if you're looking to make the wobble board part of your regular routine because it is durable and comes with a list of exercises.
pros: Thick, wooden disc with nonslip surface to keep you in place
cons: The bottom may scratch your floors, so it's best to use it on a carpeted surface

website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy balance board is durable and not too challenging to use, so it's practical for almost anyone who needs a tool to improve balance.
pros: Has a durable build and a reliable non-slip surface
Can be mastered by kids with a little practice
cons: Somewhat small, so larger models may be more practical for larger individuals

customer_reviews.title: Balance Board stretches and strengthens all the muscles ... far superior to doing planks
customer_reviews.text: I’m working to recover from lower body paralysis, and I find that exercising on the Balance Board stretches and strengthens all the muscles of the anterior, posterior, lateral and medial compartments, from the soles of my feet to the top of my neck. I also find that stretching the muscles is as important as strengthening them, and for this reason I think the Balance Board is far superior to doing planks, which are static and do not stretch the muscles.
customer_reviews.author: G. P.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with strengthening muscles
customer_reviews.text: Had a partial hip replacement last year. The PT rehab had this piece of equipment as part of the recovery/strengthening process. I got one of these now because I have arthritis in my knee and want to work on range of motion before the knee goes bad, too. I have only had it a few days but seems to be taking some of the stiffness out. I use it a couple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Half-Baked59

customer_reviews.title: Wobble Wobble
customer_reviews.text: Love my wobble board and the price was great. This is my second one. The first one I bought from another vendor on Amazon and it is also 5 stars. Both appear to be the same product with a different name logo in the center. It is well made and nice and solid. I got this second one on prime day for a steal. Why two? This way my daughter and I can each stand on one and play catch. Works great for coordination, core, and ankle strength. Got the first one as a recommendaton from my therapist while restrengthening my achilles tendon.
customer_reviews.author: BRYAN BURR

customer_reviews.title: Great balance board, almost as good as Bosu ball
customer_reviews.text: Great board. My physiotherapist told me this is very close to Bosu ball. I tried both and if money wasn't a factor I would have bought the Bosu ball. But this is still a great board. It's lighter, cheaper and much more compact than a Bosu. I bought one for my father as well. It feels solid. One can achieve important angles before the board touches the floor. Large enough for my feet (43-44 EU, 9.5 US). I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a dancer and I bought this to improve my balance. Ever since I started using it, my balance has gotten better. A lot of my friends have asked me where I got it because they also want to improve there balance. Definitely recommend to anyone wanting to improve their balance.
customer_reviews.author: EllenKris1

customer_reviews.title: Simple, well built,  great device
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing yet simple board to help me after my ACL surgery. Granted, it's months past (follow your doctor's orders). I figured it would be so simple to do. NOT. This really is a training tool. Very well built. Great designed. Challenges you. I would highly recommend this to benefit your work out or sports performance
customer_reviews.author: Joe Davis

customer_reviews.title: Used one Like It in Physical Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this balance board because I used one in physical therapy for my knees and it helped. It's well made and does the work I expected it to do. I would recommend that older people use on a carpeted surface because, until you get used to it, it tends to spin around on a hard floor and you need to be holding on to something to keep your balance. I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Northskymare

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought one sooner
customer_reviews.text: I use this balance board every day. I weigh 230+ and have no problem using it. I use on on carpet, so I do have to move it around so I don't wear out a spot. I wouldn't trust myself on a hard floor. I got it for my SI joint dysfunction. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Sliva

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size for a child
customer_reviews.text: This device does not allow one to get into the proper squat stance for anyone above the height of 4ish feet. I am 5'10" and because this isn't a dating site you can believe me, I have a 30" waist. This device is just over 15" wide. The instruction booklet that is shown in one of the images suggests something else. This is not a good use for adults who intend to use this device for a squat stance or for those who have shoulders wider than 16". This device works well for single appendage applications.
customer_reviews.author: domestiquedwp

customer_reviews.title: Doing a balancing act.
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get my core into shape with this and it's a balance board with a stiff plastic dome on the bottom. The circular part is made of wood, so where it doesn't have the grip tape is getting dirty and not easy to clean. But at least it's getting my balance back. Because we have hardwood floors, we placed it on a small thick carpet so it wont' damage our floors. Probably should have bought one that would be good on hardwood. but it was an impulse buy with the Lightning Deals. Everyone in the family now uses it to balance or do the exercises they provided.
customer_reviews.author: Pat K

customer_reviews.title: like the wood
customer_reviews.text: Appears well made. like the wood. It seems to work ok but since my first review I have discovered that the bottom plastic ball is off center by about 1/2 inch
customer_reviews.author: hello there

customer_reviews.title: Works great and a real value
customer_reviews.text: I have an older balance board from another maker and it works great as well but was far more costly. I wanted a second board as I split time between two locations and wanted a board at the second place as well. This was an economical choice and given the high rating I tried it. It does everything the more expensive board does except provide variable height. Great grip surface. Seems well made. And like any balance board it is a great addition to workouts IMHO. It always surprises me how sore I can be after really spending some time with this. Really good with older folks who need help with balance and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Balance Boards for my 7th grade Physical Education classes to use during a FITT Unit. There are 23 stations the students rotate through alternating cardio with muscular strength, muscular endurance, balance and flexibility. My students loved the challenge these brought to the stations. They are high quality and have held up to my 200 students per day using them. The customer service is TOP NOTCH. They are incredibly quick to respond and keep the customer as their #1 priority.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystee A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made with quality materials. Pleasantly surprised after reading some of the negative reviews. Those reviews are either competitors or seriously physically challenged. The support on the bottom is textured and does not slip easily as some have reported. I use it on a smooth vinyl floor and have no trouble with it slipping. Like anything involving exercise, approach it with care and common sense and you will be fine. I use this to do exercises to stabilize my knee. My physical therapist used this with me after a knee injury. It is the best thing for restoring lateral knee stability.
customer_reviews.author: TekDev

customer_reviews.title: This is tougher than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: I remember growing up we used to bring plastic versions of this to school and play during recess. This is tougher than it looks; at least for me, an average young adult, it's a real challenge to stay stabilized. I'm guessing plastic might be a little easier. It's great for my kids too, they try it out and need to really focus and stay still which is a good skill for them to learn. It's heavier than I imagined it to be, if I had to be dragging it around for a workout that would be annoying; it's pretty solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It may seem small, but it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Cool product! At first I thought it was a bit low, but that thought went away as I got use to it. I am actually glad for the height. I got this mainly in an attempt to help my balance, which it has, but the exercise sheet included with the board is extremely useful. This exercise sheet provides additional balance routines & exercises that I had not thought of helping make the balance board useful for more than just balance
customer_reviews.author: Jackino

customer_reviews.title: Must have good balance to begin
customer_reviews.text: This is more of an advanced balance board. If you do not already have pretty good balance I would not try this. There are many different exercises that come with the board to give you ideas in how to use it. I bought it to help with my physical therapy and I was up to using it before I got my knee replaced and I am now about ready to go back to it (about 1 more week) again. It is now 10 weeks after my knee replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anne4u

customer_reviews.title: Delivers what it promises
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely sturdy and made from great durable material. I am a beginner at this. Not balance training, but finding a board on my own, and doing the exercises myself as opposed to the physical therapist's clinic, so I was very pleased with this one's quality, and most importantly performance. And I love that it has an anti-slip surface. It is everything I need as a beginner to expand my home exercise range and impact
customer_reviews.author: XS

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are a gym rat; don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy but it is slippery to use on any hard floor surface. This is not what I thought I was buying. It's too late to return it so I will give it to someone who is extremely physically fit!!! Otherwise the danger of tripping is very real!
customer_reviews.author: Julie  Arcand Arcand

customer_reviews.title: Diameter too small especially w/ 30 degree angle
customer_reviews.text: The theraband one has 22 degrees range of motion and is 16 in. across. I have size 9 shoes (female) and there's very little room for my feet. Feels like they have to be positioned JUST SO, especially with large range of motion at 30 degrees. Seems well-built and sturdy, looks good enough. Good enough for the price savings, but would like it wider, would help compensate for the increased range of motion. It is easy for it to slip out from under you as others have described.
customer_reviews.author: Zeldaaah

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginners balance board for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Nice beginners balance board. My daughter wants to learn to surf but has horrible balance. She has been practicing on this for 3 months and is showing great improvement. Engages the core. She will use this for a while before moving onto a much more expensive/much more difficult endo board.
customer_reviews.author: Old lady going back to school

customer_reviews.title: My URBNFit Balance Board is not balanced
customer_reviews.text: My balance board is not balanced because the center plastic stand wasn't placed in the middle. Unfortunately, by the time I discovered it, I already got rid of the box so I can't return/exchange it. Disappointing since there are plenty of other options available. I wouldn't choose this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: hershkoy

customer_reviews.title: 30 degree max tilt and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: This board has enabled me to bring my core to a level of stability that I've only ever seen after months of Stott Pilates in less than 2 weeks (about 30 minutes total per day). I have an old injury to a knee that flares up with the wrong move every so often, so have just started to do 360 rotation moves to address it, and so far can't pull any of the usual moves to set it off. I intend to buy one of these for everyone I care about, particularly over the age of 40. Sorry to sound like a shill, but there you have it.
customer_reviews.author: pogmothoin

customer_reviews.title: ... for my tennis players to improve balance and have fun seeing who can stay on the longest without touching ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my tennis players to improve balance and have fun seeing who can stay on the longest without touching the ground. Would like to see smaller boards for 1 foot each which would be great for my players groundstroke balance as well as a slightly larger version for a wider base which would be great for stability and balance which would improve power and consistency for my players. Thanks for a fun product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well constructed. Reasonable price. I haven't used it yet, but I gave it only 3 stars because of customer service. I clearly asked a question about beginning balance work, and received an answer that didn't address the question at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Balance Board!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic Balance board!!! I was pleasantly surprised that it was almost exactly the same balance board that I use in therapy, but their board was more than triple the price I paid :D I do recommend using it on carpeting. The hard plastic will slip easily from under you, I use it on a nonslip mat. Speedy delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy board! It’s thicker than I imagined and it works really well. The texture on the top for the non slip grip is perfect! It’s not too scratchy, but just enough for grip. The weight limit on the box says 550 lbs. Incase you’re we’re wondering! I didn’t know until I opened the box. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Richburg

customer_reviews.title: Great balance board
customer_reviews.text: I used a balance board while doing physical therapy rehabilitation for knee surgery and it was so much fun! I love that you can work all the smaller, more “difficult to get to” muscles and connective tissue, while doing regular exercises. And boy does it add challenge to moves that I had already hit a plateau.
customer_reviews.author: L. Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Seems to deliver on what's promised.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Seems well made. The rough surface patches do help with keeping you feet on board without slipping. The handy workout guide is helpful and I'll be referring to it a lot. Doesn't seem cheap-o for the affordable price. Nice box for storage.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyGuy

customer_reviews.title: perfect for standing desks
customer_reviews.text: working w/ standing desk much more fun/beneficial since I got this board. When I take break w/o going further I do work on certain balance poses and stretching poses just in front of my computer. Meanwhile I can feel the difference in certain muscles groups after a month.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I watch TV. It is great for balance and core exercising. Wonderful product, I highly recommend. (Just dont wear socks, the fabric will get stuck on the sandpaper texture; also gross side note, make sure whoever uses it that their feet clean from peeling or flaking skin, the skin will get stuck on that sandpaper and its hard to get it out...gross but still good product)
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing desk - could be wider
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using this at work for my sit/stand workstation. It keeps my feet from getting fatigued and it helps with my core when I periodically disengage from my keyboard to balance. I wished it was a slight bit wider but maybe it's just my height or something, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Wing Tang

customer_reviews.title: Super small, photos dont do justice
customer_reviews.text: I thought this project would be a lot wider. Be warned it is not!
customer_reviews.author: Pash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This balance board is an excellent challenge. It helped me to fine tune my ankles and calf/shin in order to stabilize the board. It was pretty fun because I had a lot of failure, before having success come in a wave of recognition. A useful intermediate step was to perform side to side and front to back teeter totters and catch both of those when I wanted to. Great price for something that you will definite get a lot out of if you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Balance Board is too small and could be dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the pictures on the box/ This think is tiny and definitely not how the pictures make it look. Trying to do any of the press-up balancing poses on this would be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than what I expected Worked on carpet as well as hardwood although better on hardwood. Good non slip surface, but wear shoes
customer_reviews.author: SSNelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent balance board, though wouldn't be my first choice for a standing desk
customer_reviews.text: The balance board is very sturdy and an excellent value. I bought it for my standing desk and find a bit more challenging than the first board I had (my son is using it now, LOL) but I'm getting used to it and it's an excellent core workout while I'm standing and working at my computer keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Peterson

customer_reviews.title: So much fun and challenging
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it at my desk every day and it is amazing for strengthening your core. I also find it kind of fun actually to use I feel like I’m on a snowboard balancing. I don’t let anyone know I’m having a good time at work LOL but it is quite fun and challenging. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KSM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance board
customer_reviews.text: Moves freely in all directions without stopping, you can’t fall off, the anti slip stuff on top works really well barefoot or with so ks
customer_reviews.author: FoxiestMoxie

customer_reviews.title: Let me start off by saying this is not easy, there is nothing easy about the board
customer_reviews.text: I received this today. Let me start off by saying this is not easy, there is nothing easy about the board! And I am NOT new to balance boards. I'm very happy with my purchase! Also as another person who did a review on it put it "Use this on a rug until you get use to it so you font easily slip off of it"
customer_reviews.author: PrincessD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was after
customer_reviews.text: I picked one of these up at a trade show years ago. It's a fantastic little piece of exercise equipment because it's so fun to use, you use it. It's not a chore. It's an ongoing challenge. The chart that came with it with all the various exercises was a little silly. I mean... sure, I guess you could also do that stuff with it, but I just use it for one footed balance, and it's worth the money for just that usage.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Lugeons

customer_reviews.title: Needs a non-slick surface
customer_reviews.text: Excellent board for my standing desk. The only issue is that there is no grip on the bottom of the plastic balance ball, so in my office that has tile floors, I have to put a mat under it. It's very slick on hard floors, but amazing on the carpet or a mat. Very well built otherwise and seems to be helping my lower back pain and definitely strengthening my legs and core.
customer_reviews.author: kristina phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Well built.  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Well built and does exactly what it is meant to. Only silly thing is that the images on the exercise instructional are super sized. The board would have to be twice the size to be to scale... Minor gripe, more humorous than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Dau

customer_reviews.title: Fun and probably good for you too!
customer_reviews.text: It's probably good for me too but I think this thing is a blast. I was doing PT for knee and hip issues and was annoyed that the dr gave me dumb exercises and shoe inserts. I figured my body could help itself by being stronger! Plus...it's just fun. I love it. My balance is better than my husband's so that's great too haha.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Willett

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to aid in training for long distance hiking and to relieve knee pain related to mild cartilage damage in my left knee. This combined with foot strength exercises (look up intrinsic foot strength) has done the trick. After several months of using this 3 or more times per week I notice I feel much more stable on my feet and my knee pain is reduced. The board is built solid (I'm 6' 210lbs) and I've had no issues. Would buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Fun equipment
customer_reviews.text: It’s such a fun workout equipment. From parents to kids, everyone tried it and had fun on it. It will make our workout schedule and routine a lot funner.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdily made and good to use
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdily made and good to use. I think it is doing good for a heavy, older woman with great need to strengthen core muscles :)
customer_reviews.author: Ceeg

customer_reviews.title: A Great Challenge!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT try this on a hard surface unless you have really good balance (but then why would you buy it?) On a carpet it is doable and a great challenge for me who is working on regaining balance. Built well and very sturdy. Can hold heavier people too.
customer_reviews.author: RSWick

customer_reviews.title: Good and hard!
customer_reviews.text: This ain’t no joke! It’s harder than other balance boards I’ve tried but it makes it more fun and challenging. Definitely takes a lot of core stability to stand on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: Partially used????
customer_reviews.text: I think I got a used one or something. It was already scratched up on the wood and there was a bunch of wood already coming off on the corner. Super disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Taty

customer_reviews.title: Avulsion Fracture therapy
customer_reviews.text: This balance board is helping me stretch out my calves, since I stand all day at work. It's great for strengthening ligaments, feet/toes and stretching out my ankles. As we age, our balance can worsen. I believe this board will help my feet to stay strong, therefore helping with balance.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brouillard

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This work great. My chiropractor recommended balance exercises for my knee injury and said that this would work just fine. The product is well made and I am seeing an improvement in my knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: Gary (.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is made from cheap plywood and cracked after 2 times used. Useless now. I I got a bad piece of wood and they replace the item or refund I would be happy.
customer_reviews.author: unhappy camper

customer_reviews.title: Well built and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I have had this over a year now and I like it better than any of the ones at the gym or that I bought previously. It is very sturdy -- the top has nice grip pads is big enough for both feet comfortably; the bottom is smooth with a consistent balance shape. I have evolved several different exercises and it now has a regular place in my routine.
customer_reviews.author: househacker

customer_reviews.title: My Cheerleader Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our Daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it. She is a competitive cheerleader and she is a flyer. She uses it to practice her balance and strengthen her core. Perfect for every athlete.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works core muscles while improving knee pain
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought it to work core muscles while standing at desk, and it is making a difference in strength and appearance. It is also improving my posture and sports-related knee pain. I can now run again and even sleep better as a result. Best purchase I've made this year!
customer_reviews.author: redgreen

customer_reviews.title: sturdy. works muscles with little effort
customer_reviews.text: suprisingly easy to work muscles i didnt know i had. start slow. the only product picture on amazon that shows the ball on the bottom is round. very good wood. not slippery at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolettey

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and really helps with balance and strength. I can really feel the difference in my ankles when standing on one leg.
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: VERY impressive product!
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy and well made, especially for the price. Recovering from my 3rd major ankle injury and this is fantastic. Went out today without a brace for the first time in a year!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Burton

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: This balance board is well built, providing a sturdy surface on which to stand. The top surface is well marked to show you the center of the board and you’re able to use with or without shoes or even socks. It’s fun and challenging to use and the workout guide gives you some ideas on how to expand on the use of the board.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Good for balance training. Harder than it looks. I was in a bad car accident and I find using this in my home more effective than physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Zehrfox

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ankle Stability/Balance
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Product is a little smaller than what I was using in PT after breaking my leg but does the exact same job. Great to use for ankle exercises to regain balance and stability. Would definitely purchase again if needed. Love that it came with exercise chart so I can learn to use it for other core exercises as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More challenging than a Bosu ball
customer_reviews.text: Balance is harder to maintain than on a Bosu ball. The smaller size is a plus as it’s easier to store. Overall it Works quite well. It does spin a bit at at first until you get a better balance. I use it on a laminate floor and it doesn’t slip out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: it's not easy! This board has a rough material on top ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this board for my daughter who takes aerials classes to help with her balance. Well, I ended up having to have physical therapy and one of the things I have to do is stand on a balance board. . . it's not easy! This board has a rough material on top that keeps you from sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: Kistmyst

customer_reviews.title: Wobble wobble wobble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with a stand up desk at work. It is sturdy, well made, and fun to use. It makes me stand with a neutral spine and I'm more aware of my posture even when I'm not standing on the board.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pelt

customer_reviews.title: Very good balance Board
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this Board for rehab from ankle surgery. I'm a 220 lb athletic male and it does great for me. Very sturdy and hasn't slipped once on me. Not even on hardwood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Mask

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for helping to regain my strength and balance after having knee surgery. I started out small and moved up to this. I like how versatile it is. I can stand on it for balance, squat, do push-ups. It adds difficulty since I am not cleared to exercises with heavy weights. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Kuehl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new balance board! It is very durable and well made. Very solid. I use it almost every day for core strength and balance training. I would and I have actually recommended this product to a friend. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: jmax479

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to expect when I ordered this as I have used these at my PT office but have not ordered one for myself until now. You really aren't sure what you will get but this item has not disappointed me. It is very sturdy and performs well. After going through Chemo and Radiation this past year, my body has paid a price in my joints and muscles. I am looking forward to regaining my balance and strength using this board. Thank you for putting good quality into your product! It was a great price for the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anita V

customer_reviews.title: great core trainer i just had back surgery and now ...
customer_reviews.text: delivered early, great core trainer i just had back surgery and now my hips are weak this is helping my issue, reccomended by both of my pt trainers thanks UBNfit
customer_reviews.author: JOHN Y.

customer_reviews.title: Balance
customer_reviews.text: It is a good starter board. You have to hold on to something so that you don't roll your ankle or fall.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Poor craftsmanship. Pivot piece was off center and wouldn't allow proper balancing. Returned it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout tool
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, harder than it looks. Had to use the wall to start, but I am getting the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: chris bradley

customer_reviews.title: Wood snapped don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I received this product, however when I stepped on it, the wood snapped. I’m about 170 lbs, and it says it can hold up to 500lbs. Cheap wood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My balance is 100% better.
customer_reviews.text: I use my balance board just about everyday. I incorporate it in my workout which usually comprises some kind of circuit training. One of the trainers at my gym recommended it, and I’m glad he did. Being sixty, working on balance has outsized importance. This is a great way to keep fit and coordinated. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Mootz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product thanks
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product extremely well made sturdy enough for my 300+ frame. Very quickly able to feel improved balance after limited use. Will continue to use for a long time. Great secure surface and feel, challenging but doable for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protect your floor first.
customer_reviews.text: Something I didn't think of... a hint to others... The pivot point on the bottom is a very hard plastic that could mark and damage floors. Keep this in mind when setting up your site for use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to put something under to prevent maring of floor
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Need to put something under it to prevent maring of floor. Took couple of weeks of daily practice to be able to balance on it. Comes with a sheet of suggested exercises.
customer_reviews.author: N. Satow

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise
customer_reviews.text: Well made with good sandpaper top, sturdy, cheap, great exercise (try doing push ups on thus one, for example(
customer_reviews.author: Maxim Novikov

customer_reviews.title: High quality fit and finish.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to find that this product is high quality. The fit and finish is equal to balance boards at my physical therapist office. I would buy it again for a gift as I don't see it breaking anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Texas_Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Balance board does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same balance board I've been using at physical therapy for a broken knee cap. I wanted to double up my efforts and use it at home. Inexpensive and very sturdy. Getting lots of use out of it and hope to use it after PT is over for other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: laurel parker

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: When I am not using this to exercise I keep it underneath my desk in my office at home. That way when I'm sitting for Great Links I can actually exercise my legs underneath the desk by tipping it side-to-side. Absolutely great all around product
customer_reviews.author: grrrr says Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Can hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.text: If you are not stable already, you can seriously hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Ketabkhoon

customer_reviews.title: Just as it should be
customer_reviews.text: I have not mastered the stability portion of this item as of yet. That would be a personal defect, thus why I purchased. I am sure with regular use it will get easier.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: too tall for balance challenged
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is very good, it is just too tall, so too much wobble for me. I am balance challenged and I am returning before I hurt myself.
customer_reviews.author: steven stroka

customer_reviews.title: Physical Therapy
customer_reviews.text: The Balance Board is exactly what I used in physical therapy for Achilles Tendon problems. I continue the therapy at home and wanted some specialized equipment. Perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. I bought it to work on balance, and I think I see an improvement. Took me a few days to learn to balance, now I use it for a few minutes multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a year now in order to build up a weak ankle. The ankle is much better and my balance has improved greatly. I don't know if I can attribute that to the Balance Board, but I'll keep using it. The price was right and it is a solid piece of equipment. Yes I would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three different boards from different brands to help kids with attention issues. I liked the urbn fit one the best because it is so sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous411

customer_reviews.title: Anti-aging
customer_reviews.text: Wobble board is great for older folks whose balance is beginning to weaken. Will prevent falls because early recovery of balance is easier and more reliable. Also fun while watching tv or listening to dance music.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Core trainer works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Just received my core trainer. It came within a couple of days after ordering. I really like it. It is well constructed, strong, and nicely designed.
customer_reviews.author: Avis

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: When you are watching your Netflix binge series you can exercise. I use this and lift small weights. The exercise chart was helpful and challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Attractive, Variable Use
customer_reviews.text: This board is sturdy and more attractive than a plastic board. The ability to balance in 360 degrees is fantastic - you can vary the muscles challenged. The non-slip grips are strong - if you wear socks on the board it will pull the fabric however, I have stepped on the board barefoot and it is comfortable. The instruction sheet on balance and core exercises is very informative. I use this board with my standing desk and I find it very compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Leyden

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and good value!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and a good value. I'm improving balance because I'm buying a paddle board and this is the perfect tool to help with that. Nice wood body and the grit paper allows for a good footing.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Stone

customer_reviews.title: A true workout
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and truly challenging balance board! Don’t try this if you are prone to falling (I feel like I’m warning that coffee is hot) Great balance board!!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Too small, hard plastic slips
customer_reviews.text: This board is smaller than expected not for a beginner. My feet wouldn’t fit together on it.
customer_reviews.author: Wnkcapps

customer_reviews.title: This balance board is PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a desk for 8 or more hours a day and bought a riser a couple of months ago but wanted more. This balance board is it! I love that I can stand at my desk and work and do a little working out, too. It does not interfere with my typing. The board is very sturdy. And I love that it came with a workout guide! Two thumbs up....highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TheresaKrav

customer_reviews.title: Good for working on balance
customer_reviews.text: This takes some practice. I recommend using it on a rug or something so you don't slip. All of my family has had to try it out so it has been fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.. great price
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes here just” likes”...sturdy , satisfying ROM and nice to watch tv on while getting a lil workout! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sass Water in Washington

customer_reviews.title: Balance work that works
customer_reviews.text: This is great to work on balance and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Anto

product_meta.title: URBNFit Balance Board - Core Trainer - Increase Stability, Strength and Flexibility - Ballet and Dance Trainer
feature_bullets: IMPROVE YOUR BALANCE: Originally created for surfers, thiswobble board is designed to strengthen your lower back, increase balance & coordination, & boost sports performance
USE ON ANY SURFACE: It's special anti-skid surface offers a super strong grip, allowing our balance board to be safely be used everywhere.
ULTRA VERSATILE DEVICE: Use with your standing desk or work out for a variety of sports & training programs including strength training, ballet, dance, & rehab exercise, & more
FOR ALL AGES & FITNESS LEVELS: From kids to adults to improve your posture, boost athletic performance, & even REDUCE THE RISK OF INJURIES after surgeries or accidents
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Adhering to URBNFit high-quality standards, If you have any concerns or issues, we will replace or refund your purchase no questions asked!
